function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate control of infectious disease spread in office environments due to design aspects.","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission and potential workplace outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Implement touch-free technologies, reorient the control environment, and enforce behavior standards.","Technologies":"Touch-free technologies, air filtration, and ventilation systems.","People":"Office workers, factory workers, and visitors.","Owner":"Office facility managers, company management, and regulatory authorities."},{"Description":"Dependence on limited literature for understanding vulnerabilities of office buildings to COVID-19 diseases.","Impact":"Potential oversight of critical vulnerabilities and ineffective control measures.","Mitigation":"Conduct extensive research, engage in continuous monitoring, and incorporate international and national regulations and guidelines.","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, monitoring systems, and research databases.","People":"Research organizations, regulatory authorities, and building management.","Owner":"Research organizations, regulatory authorities, and building management."}]}
